View Context¶

The ViewContext is an object containing information about the current view and methods that allow manipulation of it’s properties.

class ViewContext(id)¶
Arguments:
  • id (string) – the instanceId of the component
ViewContext.storage¶

an instance of the ClienStorage class sandboxed for the curent ViewContext
